statements: SELECT * FROM hashtags WHERE post_id = 'c6e1d5c3-5b95-4fbf-8527-6d50f2ae757d';
SELECT hashtag_name, post_date FROM hashtags WHERE hashtag_id = '7f3fc632-6704-4e0b-8c83-88a10e4b8d5b';
SELECT post_content FROM hashtags ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT hashtag_name FROM hashtags;
SELECT * FROM hashtags WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND post_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM hashtags WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT hashtag_name, post_content FROM hashtags WHERE hashtag_name LIKE '%data%' OR hashtag_name LIKE '%analysis%';
SELECT DISTINCT hashtag_name FROM hashtags WHERE post_content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT hashtag_name, post_date FROM hashtags WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM hashtags WHERE hashtag_name IN ('SQL', 'database', 'schema') AND post_content LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hashtags;
SELECT hashtag_name FROM hashtags WHERE hashtag_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, hashtag_name FROM posts JOIN hashtags ON posts.hashtag_id = hashtags.hashtag_id;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 10;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE hashtag_id = 2 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT hashtag_name FROM hashtags WHERE hashtag_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT post_id, post_content, hashtag_name FROM posts JOIN hashtags ON posts.hashtag_id = hashtags.hashtag_id WHERE posts.post_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM posts JOIN hashtags ON posts.hashtag_id = hashtags.hashtag_id WHERE hashtag_name LIKE 'fun%';
SELECT * FROM hashtags;
SELECT hashtag_name FROM hashtags ORDER BY hashtag_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 3;
SELECT post_content, hashtag_name FROM posts INNER JOIN hashtags ON posts.hashtag_id = hashtags.hashtag_id;
SELECT hashtag_name, frequency_count FROM hashtags INNER JOIN hashtag_frequency ON hashtags.hashtag_id = hashtag_frequency.hashtag_id WHERE frequency_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM hashtags WHERE hashtag_id = 1;
SELECT hashtag_name, frequency_count FROM hashtags JOIN hashtag_frequency ON hashtags.hashtag_id = hashtag_frequency.hashtag_id;
SELECT post_id, post_content, hashtag_name FROM posts JOIN hashtags ON posts.hashtag_id = hashtags.hashtag_id;
SELECT * FROM hashtag_frequency WHERE frequency_count > 100 ORDER BY frequency_count DESC;
SELECT hashtag_name, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM hashtags JOIN posts ON hashtags.hashtag_id = posts.hashtag_id GROUP BY hashtag_name ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM hashtags;
SELECT tag, frequency FROM hashtags ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT id, content FROM posts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT post_id, hashtag_id FROM post_hashtags WHERE post_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT tag_id, total_usage, last_used FROM tag_stats WHERE total_usage > 100 ORDER BY last_used ASC;
SELECT * FROM hashtags WHERE frequency > 100 ORDER BY tag ASC;
SELECT id, tag, frequency FROM hashtags WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY frequency DESC;

SELECT posts.id, content, created_at, tag FROM posts JOIN post_hashtags ON posts.id = post_hashtags.post_id JOIN hashtags ON post_hashtags.hashtag_id = hashtags.id WHERE tag = 'database' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT hashtags.tag, tag_stats.total_usage, tag_stats.last_used FROM hashtags JOIN tag_stats ON hashtags.id = tag_stats.tag_id WHERE total_usage > 50 ORDER BY last_used ASC;
SELECT post_id, tag, content FROM post_hashtags JOIN posts ON post_hashtags.post_id = posts.id JOIN hashtags ON post_hashtags.hashtag_id = hashtags.id ORDER BY post_id, tag ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND hashtag_id = 3;
SELECT u.username, p.post_content FROM users u JOIN user_posts up ON u.id = up.user_id JOIN posts p ON up.post_id = p.id;
SELECT h.hashtag, COUNT(*) AS count FROM hashtags h JOIN post_hashtags ph ON h.id = ph.hashtag_id GROUP BY h.hashtag HAVING count > 10;
SELECT * FROM hashtags WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content FROM users JOIN user_posts ON users.id = user_posts.user_id JOIN posts ON posts.id = user_posts.post_id;
SELECT posts.post_content, hashtags.hashtag FROM posts JOIN post_hashtags ON posts.id = post_hashtags.post_id JOIN hashtags ON hashtags.id = post_hashtags.hashtag_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts, users.username FROM users JOIN user_posts ON users.id = user_posts.user_id GROUP BY users.username ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
